text:
When it comes to being determined for a role and giving all it takes, no one is as sincere as Aamir Khan. He knows how to get into the skin of the characters. Be it losing or gaining weight, Aamir has always surprised and won hearts with his drastic transformations.
Be it Ghajini or Dangal, Aamir's determination has always won our respect. At a recent media interaction, Aamir was quizzed by the media about what he does when he attends lavish parties. Aamir had an interesting anecdote to share. Talking about it, Aamir said,
Twitter
"I carry my own tiffin. If you ever meet Shah Rukh ask him about it, he will tell you an interesting story. When Tim Cook visited SRK's home, he invited all of us for dinner. Gauri (Khan) told me to have dinner and I told her I will definitely eat and go. She went on to say dinner is served, so I replied 'I have got my own tiffin'."
He added that when his diet food was served, everyone was taken aback by the quantity.
Twitter
He added that SRK cracked a joke saying he was confused whether Aamir is gaining weight or losing it. This incident happened when he was prepping for Dangal.

Aamir added that since he is always prepping for some or the other role, he prefers to carry his own meals in tiffin boxes.
Not many know that for his upcoming film Lal Singh Chaddha, Aamir will lose 20 kgs.
